I canâ€™t say enough how wonderful the experience was!!!!! The entire staff was so friendly and welcoming. The girls hair cuts were fabulous and the styling is top tier!!!!!! We will definitely be coming back here again and again!!!! Thank you so much for taking care of our girls curls!!!!!
walked in today after stumbling into this place while going to ups. my daughter begged to get her haircut. fantastic experience and she felt so good about herself afterwards. it was amazing, and i highly recommend.
From Sharkey's Cuts for Kids
